Posts.Content: Kristyn wrote: Hello, my name is Kristyn i took lo estrin 24 fe birth control last year and noticed immediate changes in my body. vomitting every morning dizziness and a breast lump. i called my ob/gyn and he blew it off not seeming very concerned. i stopped taking the birth control about a month after i started it, now for the past two months ive have a lump under my left armpit that im thinking is  a lymph node.. ive been ignoring it since i feel dumb going back to my doctor. i got concerned when it started to make my arm,neck and shoulder ache.. should i be concerned..not quite sure what to do at this point since ive had the breast lump over a year and the armpit lump for two month now Log in to post a reply
